特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Lecture. Seminar. Discussion. Presentation.
For students permitted to take the course online, materials will be provided through LUNA.
